item.description: This class defines the parameters of the world then dies.

field.name: world_parameters.gravity.x
field.description: The x value of the gravity.

field.name: world_parameters.gravity.y
field.description: The y value of the gravity.

field.name: world_parameters.speed_epsilon.x
field.description: The value under which the absolute value of the speed is considered to be equal to zero on the x axis.

field.name: world_parameters.speed_epsilon.y
field.description: The value under which the absolute value of the speed is considered to be equal to zero on the y axis.

field.name: world_parameters.angular_speed_epsilon
field.description: The value under which the absolute value of the angular speed is considered to be equal to zero.

field.name: world_parameters.unit
field.description: The number of units of the world in a meter.

field.name: world_parameters.default_friction
field.description: Default friction applied to the items.
